mapper.select: SELECT inquiry_id AS inquiryId, inquiry_title AS inquiryTitle, inquiry, inquiry_date AS inquiryDate, inquiry_type AS inquiryType, secret, user_id AS userId FROM inquiry ORDER BY inquiry_id DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT inquiry_id AS inquiryId, inquiry_title AS inquiryTitle, inquiry AS inquiry, inquiry_date AS inquiryDate, inquiry_type AS inquiryType, secret AS secret, user_id AS userId FROM inquiry WHERE inquiry_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inquiry (inquiry_title, inquiry, inquiry_date, inquiry_type, secret, user_id) VALUES (#{inquiryTitle}, #{inquiry}, NOW(), #{inquiryType}, #{secret}, #{userId})
